dct_title_s: Carte générale des routes d'Italie et des pays limitrophes à l'usage des voyageurs
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. Includes inset showing railroad routes from Paris to Switzerland and Italy. Originally issued in cover 19 x 12 cm.
dct_publisher_sm: Paris : J. Andriveau-Goujon, 1870 (Paris : Impie. de Chardon, jne. fils, Rue Racine, 3)
